entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain near noon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning.
